patthana23.53:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.53:1.1_0: if he doesn’t take part in a wrong way, not getting material possessions to have caused.
patthana23.53:2.1_0: if he does not take part in a monastic boundary that has an undecided teaching, nor by the mere fact of giving up the teachings; the cause of speech that arises when he has been appointed.
patthana23.53:3.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without itness.
